title: Error Code 004
body: Since this new patch came out, I've been unable to finish updating and it keeps giving me the message saying error 004. I've tried restarting my laptop and even clean uninstalling with the Hextech Repair Tool but the game still gives me the same error. I haven't been able to find a solution that works and I'm worried my league won't work again.. please help!

replies.body: This error can happen if your network or some security setting is blocking the patcher from preparing for an update.  My suggestion would be to go through the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to help get this fixed up.  Hit me up if you run into any issues along the way.
If I gave League of Legends, you guys would have my social security and birth certificate. I've never had an issue until now with the new client being installed. You guys are literal garbage.

I've been able to get into the client, but needed to install all of these patches in safe mode. Although, now I can't connect to games and left with the client stuck on the reconnect screen on the newest client. If I go to the old client, it tries to connect and the client disappears and the load screen never shows up.
Hey guys. I just wanted to know if error code 004 goes away with a new patch version please respond immediately. Thank you so much
